founders.name: Harshit Jain
founders.bio: Harshit Jain represents a new generation of Ayurvedic thinkers rooted deeply in classical knowledge and disciplined practice.
founders.philosophy: Where tradition is treated as a legacy, not a trend.

founders.name: Muskan Agrawal
founders.bio: Muskan Agrawal brings elegance, balance, and thoughtful clarity to Ayurveda, translating ancient wisdom into refined modern wellness.
founders.philosophy: An aesthetic of wellness, guided by wisdom.
